title: Occupational Safety & Health Administration Recent Weekly Reports of Fatalities and Catastrophes, United States, 2009
name: Occupational Safety & Health Administration Recent Weekly Reports of Fatalities and Catastrophes, United States, 2009
description: Occupational Safety & Health Administration (OSHA)weekly summaries of fatalities and catastrophes resulting in the hospitalization of three or more workers. Employers must report these incidents to OSHA within eight hours. The summaries below include only preliminary information, as reported to OSHA Area Offices or to States which operate OSHA-approved State Plans. OSHA investigates all work-related fatalities and catastrophes. Once the OSHA investigation is complete, these summary reports corresponding inspections, which lists citation information.

properties.company and location: Cemeterio Mayaguez Memorial, Inc., Mayaguez PR 00681
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was moving and cutting marble and granite covers. While the worker was working on one cover, it fell on the worker killing him and injuring another employee and the owner.

properties.company and location: International Shipping Agency, Inc., San Juan, PR 00902
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was run over by an intermodal container.

Two workers were plastering walls at an elevated height of 150-feet, a mast scaffold was used as a working platform. The scaffold platform became loose and fell to the ground, killing the two workers.
The worker was working on dispatching merchandise and was pinned against the merchandise by the fork lift being driven by another employee.
The worker was found in the freezer warehouse at forklift operator station.
Worker was crushed between a forklift and a parked flatbed truck.

properties.company and location: United Parcel Service Co.,  Miami, FL 33152
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was unloading a palette of boxed flowers, and was struck on the torso, while pulling a box towards him. The stack of boxed fell, causing him to lose his balance, and fall backwards down 1'8" high.
Worker was performing roadway repair and was struck by a vehicle.
Victim was conducting roofing work, and fell through a hole in the roof, 25 feet to the concrete floor below.

properties.company and location: Master Mechanical Services, Inc.  Hinleah, FL 33012
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was performing welding operations and was electrocuted.

properties.company and location: Gulf Stream Marine Inc., Brownsville, TX 78526
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was unloading a vessel and was struck by a loose spinning cargo sling chain.

properties.company and location: Big Lade Planting, Belle Glade, FL 33430
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was driving a tractor pulling wagons in sugarcane harvesting, went off the road into a canal, drowning.

properties.company and location: Ault Bros. Inc. Electrical Contractors, Stuart, FL 34997
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker fell 8 ft, 10 inches from a scaffold landing on the concrete floor below.
Worker was cutting a tree and the limb he was cutting fell on him causing him to fall 40 feet to the ground below.

properties.company and location: JSJ Tile & Stone, Inc., Bradenton, FL 34209
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was struck by a pick-up truck that was backing up from a warehouse.

properties.company and location: Palacios Marine and Industrial, Corpus Christi, TX 78469
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was working on the 2nd floor of a building and fell through an open door way to the ground.

properties.company and location: Strouhal Tire Centers, Corpus Christi, TX 78409
properties.preliminary description of incident: Employee was working under a front end loader utilizing a wooden block and a 20-ton bottle jack to lift a front end loader that fell, crushing the worker.
Victim was pressure washing a vessel standing on a scaffold 15 to 20 feet, and fell.

properties.company and location: Veolia Environmental Services Pinellas, Inc., St. Petersburg, FL 33716-2002
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was welding and was struck by a piece of metal.
Victim was inside a building bundling material and became ill, possible heat stroke.

properties.company and location: Coastal Drilling Land Company, Encinal, TX 78019
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was struck by a derrick.

properties.company and location: Walt Disney World Co.  Buena Vista, FL 32830
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was performing tumbling and roll movements, made contact with another employee and afterwards exhibited difficulty breathing.

properties.company and location: Walt Disney World  Lake Buena Vista, FL 32830
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim, during a choreographed sword fight, stumbled and fell into a wall.

properties.company and location: Metals USA - Royal Aluminum  Groveland, FL 34736
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was preparing a piece of equipment for maintenance, and collapsed.

properties.company and location: J J Auto Air, Inc. dba Dependable Auto Repair, Winter Park, FL 32789
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was driving an ATV and lost control of the vehicle, running it into a wall.

properties.company and location: Advanced Utility Service, Inc., Sanford, FL 32773
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was working in an aerial lift upgrading three phases of an electrical distribution line. He was on the pole during the process of hoisting and moving the existing energized "A" phase and contacted energized conductors and was exposed to 7,620-volts of AC voltage. Victim was electrocuted.
Worker was found unresponsive in the employee restroom.

Employees were removing a cap on a 12-inch natural gas pipeline. Employees working nearby were doing some oxygen/acetylene cutting. While removing the cap, natural gas escaped and was ignited by the cutting process. One employee fatality and two employees were hospitalized.
Worker was carrying tiles on residential roof. He backed up into an overhead power line and was electrocuted.

properties.company and location: St. Peter Catholic Church, Deland, FL 32720
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was cleaning the grout on the walls with a pressure washer, containing water, and was overexposed to carbon monoxide.
Worker was doing repairs on the roof of apartments using a 24-foot aluminum extension ladder. He descended from the ladder, stepping on the first step and fell 20-22 feet.

properties.company and location: MJM Greenway Landscaping & Management, Inc.  Port Orange, FL 32128
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was doing landscaping services. He was later found collapsed in the company truck, apparent heat stress.

properties.company and location: SES Welding, LLC, Holly Bill, FL 32117
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was working under a disabled truck, disconnecting the drive shaft. The vehicle fell, crushing him.
Worker was carrying tools to the other side of a metal corrugated roof and fell 25-feet through one of the skylights.
Victim was performing roofing operations. While removing a skylight on the roof, stepped into the open hole and fell.
Victim was working on a foundation of a single family residence. He collapsed outside the adjacent house.
Worker was in a nearby workshop when the boom of a 200-ton crane collapsed into the workshop fatally injuring the worker.

properties.company and location: Dausin Electric Company  San Antonio, TX 78249
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was completing electrical work from a ladder. He was shocked and fell 8 feet to the ground.

properties.company and location: Marine Fabrication and Repair, Houma, LA 70360
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was performing welding duties aboard a marine vessel. An electrode from his welding equipment contacted the sweat on his neck, causing an electric shock.
Worker was deep in a trench wrapping fence wire around the roots of an oak tree being transplanted. The wire broke and he was caught in a cave-in.
Worker was riding on a golf cart, stood up and fell, hitting his head.
Worker was in the process of installing a wireless point at a facility. He was using a 6-ft ladder to access the ceiling, fell backwards off the ladder, striking his head on the concrete floor.

properties.company and location: Boring &Tunneling Co. of America  Houston, TX 77054
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was 140 feet inside a tunnel adjusting openings when the tunnel became filled with water. Victim drowned.
Victim was welding on an overhead interior structure of a water tank, and collapsed on the scaffold, possible heat stress.

properties.company and location: LTD Lanscaping and Supplies, Inc.  Houston, TX 77036
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was blowing leaves and debris. The leaf blower he was using contacted an air conditioning unit. Victim was electrocuted.
Worker was making a connector from a store sign to a breaker panel and was electrocuted.
Worker was struck by a 1,500-lb load.
Worker was trapped and crushed by a concrete pallet.

properties.company and location: Moreau's Material Yard, Des Allemandes, LA 70030
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was riding a lead system when the crawler crane tipped over causing him to be thrown from a platform, striking the boom of the crane.

properties.company and location: Gulf Coast Surveyors, Inc., Port Arthur, TX 77641
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was aboard a vessel observing loading the compartment with calcined coke. He tripped over a coaming and struck his head on a vent pipe.

properties.company and location: Martin Product Sales, LLC, Beaumont, TX 77705
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was on top of a railcar carrying elemental sulfur and was found unresponsive.

properties.company and location: Affordable Fast Gutters LLC Metairie, LA 70001
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was moving a ladder and touched the overhead power line with the ladder. He was electrocuted.

properties.company and location: Owensby & Kritkos, Inc., St. James, LA 70086
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was working from scaffolding platform, while setting a ladder, lost his balance and fell through a 1-foot opening between the work platform and guardrail systems, 30-feet to the ground level.

properties.company and location: Jim's Auto Service, L.L.C.  Lake City, FL 32025
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was installing a ceiling light from a ladder and received an electrical shock from the light wiring. He fell 10 feet to the shop floor, stiking objects in the repair bay on his way down.

properties.company and location: Craftsman Drywall Contractors LLC  Houston, TX 77070
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was removing sheetrock and metal studs. He was electrocuted by exposed wires.

properties.company and location: Tuttle's Machine and Supplies,  New Iberia, LA 70563
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was polishing a shaft. The shaft flew out and struck him on the chest.
Employees were splicing a de-energized downed oil field line. The oil field line got into a 7300-volt line, electrocuting one worker.

properties.company and location: Priola Construction Corporation, Lake Charles, LA 70605
properties.preliminary description of incident: Employees were attempting to raise a 14 x 26 framed wall by hand and the wind increased. The wall fell, crushing the worker and hospitalizing another employee.

properties.company and location: Y O Ranch Partnership, Mountain Home, TX 78058
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was loading a wild barrsinghuas into a holding pen. The animal gored the decedent in the leg and back.

properties.company and location: Ultimate Siding and Gutters, LLC Slidell, LA 70461
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was working from a basket lifted up by a rough terrain forklift that tipped over on its side.
Victim was surveying the ramp shoulder and was struck by an automobile.
Worker was performing maintenance on a tank area within the dry docked barge and upon exiting the area complained of experiencing breathing difficulties.
Worker was in the process of removing a boom from a crane and knocked out 2 bottom pins from the heel section. The heel section came down, striking the worker.

properties.company and location: Hughes Erection and Fabrication, Bay St. Louis, MS 39520
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was in a manlift putting on an angle to a post and was found on the ground.
Victim was on a scaffold doing repairs on an archway and the scaffold collapsed.
Worker was dismantling a 40-foot high scaffold and fell.
Worker was electrocuted.
Worker was changing the hydraulic fluid in a dump truck with the dump bed raised. The dump bed fell, pinning him.
Worker was trimming trees and was electrocuted, after the aerial lift contacted an overhead powerline, causing the bucket truck to become energized.
Workers were using a thinner product to prepare the inner section of the bottom hull for painting. There was a fire/explosion killing two workers and hospitalizing two other workers.
Victim was struck on the head by a traveling block of a ship-based crane.

properties.company and location: Disney Stores USA, LLC  Round Rock, TX 78864
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim fell from a 3-step ladder.
Worker was under a home doing plumbing work in a tunnel, dug under the concrete foundation using an electrical shovel type drill, and was electrocuted.

properties.company and location: Quincy Joist Co., Inc., Quincy, FL 32351-2714
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was struck by a joist.

properties.company and location: CGH Speciality Contractors, Inc.  Independence, LA 70443
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim, during the repair/construction of building gutters, fell from a mechanical lift.
Worker was christmas treeing three roof opening frames and the frame at the bottom of the rigging came off the hook, striking the worker.
Employees were installing a tilt-wall into a trench. Worker was inside the trench when the earth collapsed.
Worker contracted H1N1 flu.
Worker was part of a land based oil rig & natural gas well drilling rig crew and contracted the H1N1 flu.

Victim leaned across a horizontal milling machine turning at 138 RPM. One of the sleeves of his shirt was caught by either the spinning shaft or drift. Victim was pulled off the floor and wrapped around the shaft.
Worker was struck by a pipe, knocked under a V-Door and fell through the V-Door to a catwalk 20 feet below.

properties.company and location: Saenz Transport dba Luis Saenz,  Rhine, GA 31077
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was standing beside a tractor trailer dump truck operating the dump controls, unloading gravel. The load and the body shifted, causing the trailer to rollover, crushing the victim.
Worker was holding the lid of a derrick truck while the derrick was being raised. The derrick contacted overhead power transmission lines and the worker was electrocuted.
Employee was working from a ladder and fell to the ground.

properties.company and location: Priority Energy Services, LLC, Raleigh, MS 39153
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was pressure testing a new metering station at a new pipeline construction project, when an explosion occurred.
Worker was walking across a tank and fell through a hatch into a tank of boiling water. He either drowned or died of thermal burns.
Worker was working from a mechanical mezzanine and fell 14-feet through a hole in the floor to the lower level.

properties.company and location: T. A. Operating LLC dba Petro Lube Center, Jackson, MS 39201
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was assigned to check out a semi-trailer's front right air bag. While positioned between the two trailer axles, he was struck on the head by the left front air bag's base cup.

properties.company and location: Price Gregory Construction, W. Monroe, LA 71292
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was inside the engine compartment of a backhoe changing the filters and was struck by the counter weight of another backhoe.

properties.company and location: Future Lighting Services, LLC, Dublin, GA 31040
properties.preliminary description of incident: Employee was working from a scissor lift replacing a ballast to light a fixture. In connecting the ballast wires to the energized wires, worker received a fatal electrical shock and was electrocuted.

properties.company and location: Diamond Jacks Casino & Resort, Bossier City, LA 71111
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was investigating a water leak in a public stairwell between the 1st and 2nd decks. He opened a secured door leading to the exterior of the boat and fell through.

properties.company and location: Artistic Painting Company, Grand Praire, TX 75050
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was using a scaffold above 10 to 15 feet while painting. Instead of extending the scaffold, he used a step ladder on the scaffold, and fell off the scaffold.
Victim fell from a swing stage after the cable supports broke.

properties.company and location: Golden Strip Transfer, Inc., North Charleston, SC 29408
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was locking down a shipping container to the bed of his truck and was struck by the rubber tire crane.

properties.company and location: Terral Reverservice, Inc., Lake Providence, LA 71254
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was on a platform that collapsed, falling 25 feet.
Victim was returning to a job assignment and was struck by a yard-truck.

properties.company and location: CAMtech Precision Manufacturing, Inc.  Euless, TX 76040
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was moving a large metal fixture with a bridge crane. The fixture slipped off the supports and crushed him.

properties.company and location: Cliff's Auto Service Center, Springtown, TX 76082
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was changing a fluorescent overhead light and was electrocuted.

properties.company and location: Linde Material Handling North America Corporation, Summerville, SC 29483
properties.preliminary description of incident: A forklift mast fell on the worker.

properties.company and location: Sweeping Services of Texas - Operating LP  Lewisville, TX 75022
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was picking up trash/debris along the roadside and was struck by a tire that had sheared off a truck axle.
The worker was cutting the limbs of a felled tree. A tree being cut struck the worker.
Victim was working on a pole replacing a transformer, 14,400KV, and was electrocuted.

Worker was waiting in line to be loaded out at a mill. He had exited his truck to check on something on the trailer in front of him. While doing so the truck pull forward. The trailer tires struck and traveled over the worker.
Employees were installing roof trusses 20 feet from ground level, when 50 trusses fell in a domino effect crushing the employees. One employee fatality and two employees were hospitalized.
The worker was crushed under a 12-foot long, 3-inch diameter carpet roll.
Victim was installing coax cable hangers down the face of an existing tower and fell 60 to 100 feet.
Worker was welding near or on a baler and was discovered entrapped in the baler.

properties.company and location: Zodiac Services Americas  College Park, GA 30337
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was found off his forklift, apparent heart attack.
Worker got into an accident, got out of the car, walked onto the street, and was hit by another car.

properties.company and location: Stamer, Inc. dba Fulton Plumbing, Heating, Air, Atlanta, GA
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was working in an unprotected trench installing a sewer/water line. A portion of the trench caved in, fully engulfing the worker and trapping another employee, who was hospitalized.
Worker was found in employee locker room and was taken to emergency room. Worker was pronounced dead shortly after of a possible heart attack.
Worker was using a ladder to change a light bulb and fell from the ladder to the ground.

properties.company and location: Myles Construction Company, Inc., Hopkins, SC 29061
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was standing on an elevated template made of steel. The bottom cross brace of the lead struck and pinned the worker's head against an existing pilling resulting in death.
Employee was working on a roof top performing some voltage testing on an exhaust fan. He fell 25.8 feet through the roof skylight, landing on the concrete inside the building.

properties.company and location: KM Davis Contracting Co., Inc., Marietta, GA 30008
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was standing on the side of the road and was struck by a car.

properties.company and location: Direct TV Home Service Inc.  Eldridge, AL 35554
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was installing a new cable TV. While crawling under the house, came in contact with a bare wire, and was electrocuted.

properties.company and location: Art Iron Works, Inc., Onconta, AL 35121
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was in the process of assembling a transition box, while removing the brace the box collapsed, crushing him.
Victim died from a heat stroke.

properties.company and location: A-Noohi Meat Packaging Co., Vernon, CA*
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was unloading a truck when it started rolling and pinned the worker between a wall and the tire.
Worker was found on floor unconscious, no witness. (Inspection planned)
Worker was re-roofing a home and while walking on the ridge of the roof, he slipped, falling to the deck below.
The worker was operating a weed-eater on the side of the highway when he was struck by a car.

properties.company and location: Mueller Copper Tube Co., Inc.,  Fulton, MS 38843
properties.preliminary description of incident: In replacing an air pump with an electric pump that was leaking naphtha, an explosion occurred. One employee fatality and one employee hospitalization.

properties.company and location: Pages Creek Marine Services, Inc., Wilmington, NC 28411
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker used a set of 2-ton underslung hoists to raise a boat on a trailer. The boat fell, crushing the worker between the boat and the left rear of the trailer.
Worker was installing decorative lights on a 10-12 foot tree, touched an overhead electrical line and was electrocuted.

properties.company and location: L&L Fleet Services, LLC  Madison, AL 35756
properties.preliminary description of incident: The safety supports failed on a dump truck bed, causing the bed of the dump truck to fall onto the victim, crushing him.

properties.company and location: ABC Salvage & Scrap Metal, Inc  Little Rock, AR 72210.
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was struck and pinned by two track-hoes.
Worker was found in the receiving basket of a cotton stripper.
The worker was operating a pallet jack, when entering an intersection drove into the stairwell.

properties.company and location: Cross Country Vans Inc., Bosque Farms, NM 87068
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was found by another transport driver unconscious. Attempts to revive were unsuccessful.

properties.company and location: Underground Utilities Contractors, Inc., Cabot, AR 72023
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was installing a 7620-volt power line and was electrocuted.
The worker was in route to the Bernalillo County Detention Center to dispense medication to inmates and was struck by another car on the I-40 Frontage Road.
Worker was delivering a package and was run over by a front end loader.
Worker fell off a boarding ramp to a docked tug and drowned.
Worker was reaching in to straighten up brick that had fallen over to one side for the setting head and was caught between the brick and the setting head.
Worker was crushed by a truck when it fell over on him while lowering a cut tree with the boom of the truck.

properties.company and location: Ulises Jardines dba Cuba Drywall, Charlotte, NC* 28211
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was found unresponsive with head injuries next to an overturned stepladder. The worker never regained consciousness.

The worker was found on the kitchen floor of the Edgewater Hotel & Casino. The worker told a co-worker that he had collapsed on the floor. The co-worker went for help and when he returned the worker was not responding. Attempts were made to revive him but he never responded.

properties.company and location: Colorado Bell Hotel & Casino, Laughlin, NV 89028
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was not feeling well and left work early. While he was sitting waiting for the bus he collapsed and was non-responsive from an apparent heart attack. He was transported to the hospital where he was pronounced dead.

properties.company and location: U E Power Train dba Bucks Engines, Amarillo, TX 79109
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was observed standing behind the parts counter, conscious but bleeding from the head.

properties.company and location: Rocky Mountain Roofing Company, Albuquerque, NM 87114
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was installing metal coping at the roof edge when he lost his balance and fell tot he ground. The worker was hospitalized and died on October 9, 2009.

properties.company and location: Twin City Fan Companies, Ltd., Pulaski, TN 38478
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was working in a confined space fixing the motor to a fan. At 4:30 the worker collapsed while inside the confined space. Worker was taken to the hospital where the doctors say the brain activity has deteriorated and will probably not come back around. Worker is not deceased at this time.
Worker was adjusting the temperature leaning through a guardrail. He was struck by a roller cam, and his head was caught between the guardrail and roller cam.
no info

Worker was in the process of removing a box that contained a bicycle from a storage rack. He was standing on the second or third step of a step ladder. The box fell forward and he fell from the ladder, striking his head on the floor.

properties.company and location: Tyson Foods - River Valley Animal Foods, Scranton, AR 72863
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was dumping a load of offal from a tractor trailer. He was in the process of dumping offal into a bin when the tailgate malfunctioned. Worker was freeing the tailgate, it released, and the load swept the worker into the offal bin. Worker drowned in the bin.

properties.company and location: Cactus Drilling, LLC, Elk City, OK 73644
properties.preliminary description of incident: Workers (2) were struck by a load being raised by a crane when rigging spreader came loose.

properties.company and location: Fort Smith Garage Doors, Kibler, AR 72921
properties.preliminary description of incident: Victim was installing an overhead garage door. He was using a truck-mounted generator/welder to generate power for his tools. He was found unresponsive in the bed of the truck. Victim was electrocuted.

properties.company and location: Pike Electric, Inc., Mount Airy, NC 28719
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was performing maintenance on a power line when he was electrocuted.
Worker complained about not feeling well. The worker went home and collapsed about 3 hours later and died before taken to hospital.

properties.company and location: Superior Mobile Home and Transport, Greers Ferry, AR
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was spotting a mobile home. The home slipped off the jack onto the worker.

properties.company and location: William E. Lewis Logging, Inc., Greenville, NC 27834
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was struck in the head by the top of a dead tree that was falling.

properties.company and location: Canagra Food Inc. dba Conagra Snack Foods Division, Garner, NC 27529
properties.preliminary description of incident: An explosion and collapse of the building structure resulted in 4 worker deaths with the fourth succumbing to his injuries 11/19/2009.
Worker was working the drilling board. A drill pipe came loose striking the worker on the head.

properties.company and location: Tony's Construction Service, Inc., Raleigh, NC
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was demolishing a concrete block wall when the wall collapsed striking the worker resulting in crushing injuries which resulted in the fatality.
Worker was laying paper and plastic on finished floor and stepped into a hole, falling onto the concrete floor below.
Worker fell off orchard picker ladder as he was ascending with an empty orange pickers bag.

properties.company and location: Protection Service Inc., High Point, NC 27260
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was clearing a traffic control work zone when he was struck by a vehicle in the closed lane.

properties.company and location: All About Care Heating & Air Conditioning, Winston Salem, NC 27107
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was working on the roof on a home when the worker fell through a hole in the roof and hit his head against the concrete floor of the basement. He was transported to the hospital where he was pronounced dead on October 9, 2009.

properties.company and location: Escalera Maintenance Corporation, Las Vegas, NV 89123
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was assigned to perform irrigation maintenance work in an apartment complex. The worker was asked by a couple moving for help moving furniture. While moving a piece of furniture, the worker got on the truck, fell to the ground and hit his head. The worker was taken to the hospital where he died 14 days later.

properties.company and location: Yellow Checker Star Cab Company, Las Vegas, NV 89118
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was in his cab at the back stand at Harrah's Casino Hotel. Hotel security was notified when someone found the worker to be in an unresponsive state. He was transported to the hospital where he was pronounced dead.
Two workers were checking tensioning on cables for a cable guardrail along the intestate when a pick-up truck pulling a trailer lost control and crossed the median striking both workers.

properties.company and location: Rio Hotel and Casino, Las Vegas, NV 89103
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker complained of a headache and was transported to the hospital. The worker passed away from natural causes on September 24, 2009.

properties.company and location: Rio Hotel and Casino, Las Vegas, NV 89103
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker fell 70-feet into a gap that was on the formwork while removing the excess plaster.

properties.company and location: The Korte Company, Las Vegas, NV 89147
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker had come from the office trailer to the front lobby of the church where he was doing construction and collapsed. Workers administered CPR while on the phone with 911. He was transported to the hospital where he was pronounced dead.

properties.company and location: Opportunity VIllage, ARC, Las Vegas, NV 89146
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was working inside a rental car office. Worker was found unconscious by a customer near the office counter. He was transported to the hospital where he later died.
Worker collapsed in the Macy's West store. CPR was performed. The worker passed away at the hospital.

The worker collapsed in the dairy areas and was found unconscious and unresponsive by an employee. The worker was transported to the hospital where he was pronounced dead from an apparent heart attack.
The worker was found behind the sales counter unconscious and unresponsive. The worker was pronounced dead at the scene by the coroner's office at 4:30pm.

properties.company and location: Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department, Las Vegas, NV 89101
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was traveling in a patrol vehicle when the patrol vehicle left the road, struck a stationary object and rolled over. The worker was taken to the hospital where he later died.
Victim was repairing a tote at the end of the line. The top tote fell over, crushing the victim.

properties.company and location: Insulation Maintenance & Contracting, LLC, North Las Vegas NV 89030
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was insulating pipes from a scissor lift, when co-workers noticed the worker collapsed and unresponsive. The worker was transported to the hospital where he was pronounced dead.

properties.company and location: BS Truckline, Inc., 4080 East Lake Mead Blvd., Las Vegas, NV 89115
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was travelling on a highway and his vehicle swerved off the highway, went airborne and hit an embankment causing the worker to sustain fatal injuries.
The worker was repairing a skylight on the roof. He fell through the skylight area to the concrete pad. The worker died on the scene.

properties.company and location: Bristol Tennessee Essential Services, Bristol, TN 37620
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was climbing a utility pole to perform routine maintenance work and came into contact with a high voltage line.

properties.company and location: McPherson Enterprises, Inc., Lemon Cove, CA* 93657
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was crushed when the equipment he was standing on slid off the trailer it was loaded on. The worker was crushed between the bag house and the remaining equipment on the ground.

properties.company and location: S & S Communication Specialists Inc., Wet Plains, MO 65775
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker during the erection of a communication tower fell 325 feet.
The worker was at the front desk of the Restaurant when he collapsed from an apparent heart attack. CPR was performed and he was transported to the hospital where he was pronounced dead.

properties.company and location: Razban Enterprises dba Dominoes Pizza, Benton, KY 42025
properties.preliminary description of incident: Fatal heart attack. Worker was on a pizza delivery run, when his car ran off the road and struck a tree.
A cable was hooked to a small trailer that was up against a tree. The trailer started moving and the worker got between the trailer and the truck and was caught between the two.
The worker was measuring the roadway as part of the painting process when struck by a vehicle.

properties.company and location: Northwest Abatement Services, Inc., Fort Lewis, WA 98433
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was found unconscious at the base of a ladder.

properties.company and location: Dennis Powell Logging, St. Maries, ID 83861
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker was driving a log truck uphill to pick up a load of logs. The truck left the road and went 200 feet down a hill. Worker was thrown from the truck.
The worker was run over by a concrete dump trailer. The worker had severe spine, pelvic and skull injuries. He died from his injuries on 9/19/2009.

properties.company and location: Issaquah Highlands Recreation Club, Issaquah, WA 98027
properties.preliminary description of incident: Worker died as a result of being struck by a dead alder tree.
The worker was shot multiple times in the head, neck and shoulder.

properties.company and location: AAA Seattle Best Autobody Inc., Seattle, WA 98133
properties.preliminary description of incident: The worker was removing a bumper from a wrecked SUV. The worker jacked up the rear of the SUV and was underneath removing the bumper when the jack collapsed pinning the worker.

properties.company and location: Bertils Gravel Y Excavation LLC, Crookston, MN 56716
properties.preliminary description of incident: A trailer attached to a truck ran over the worker who was loading gravel from the ground.
Employee was working inside a mobile home, mixing propane and butane to make a substitute refrigerant. A fire occurred. The cause of death was determined to be carbon monoxide asphyxiation.
Worker was thawing two 3-inch valves with a propane torch on a tank trailer that exploded.

The worker was lowering a residence to meet with the shortened foundation wall. The worker was trapped and crushed between a support beam and a small section of beam stock when the structure collapsed unexpectedly.
Worker was loading containers on a barge and was found crushed between the containers.
